name: Receive points/coins for chatting
description: User gets between 1-5 (inclusive) XP/Coins for every mintue of chatting.

name: Receive points/coins for streaming
description: User gets 100 XP/Coins for every mintue of streaming.

name: Rank assignment
description: Bot assigns roles based on how many points a user has.

name: All quests completed
description: User checks every 10 minutes to see if a user has completed all the possible quests. If they have, give achievement.
